examples: He immersed himself into his studies

definitions.text: consume all of one's attention or time
examples: Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely

definitions.text: giving or marked by complete attention to; ; ; - Walter de la Mare
examples: that engrossed look or rapt delight
so intent on this fantastic...narrative that she hardly stirred

definitions.text: written formally in a large clear script, as a deed or other legal document
